title: Enhancing Customer Service Practical Competencies: Detecting Changes in Student Engagement in Hybrid Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Analyze learning management system (LMS) data to identify weekly activity pattern changes in learners with 80% accuracy
Detect periods of declining learner engagement in flipped learning environments and design at least three customized intervention strategies
Propose methods for applying learner engagement analysis results from project-based assessments to actual instructional design
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
